title: Dangerous creatures (PC)
brief_description: Welcome to the interactive world of dangerous creatures! You’ll be amazed as you discover the truth - and the extraordinary myths - about these intriguing creatures. ‘Dangerous creatures’ comes with an overview movie that teaches you the basics of using the program. The first time you start the program, you’ll be given the opportunity to see the overview. You can also choose to see the overview whenever you like. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Multimedia PC that includes a 386SX or higher, at least 4MB of RAM, 2.5MB of available hard disk space, CD-ROM drive, audio board and VGA or VGA+. MS DOS and Microsoft Windows operating system version 3.1 or later.
